alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Powhatan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Amelia and southwestern Powhatan Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morven, or near Amelia Courthouse. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Amelia Courthouse, Morven, Tobaccoville, Paineville, Maplewood, Deatonville, Rodophil, Lodore, Truxillo, Giles Mill, Winterham and Genito. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
